movie.title: Even the Crows: A Divided Gujarat
movie.title_english: Even the Crows: A Divided Gujarat
movie.title_long: Even the Crows: A Divided Gujarat (2014)
movie.description_intro: At a time where the controversial Chief Minister of Gujarat, Narendra Modi, is running to be India's next Prime Minister, Even the Crows explores the way in which his politics and Hindu nationalist ideology have polarised Gujarat along religious lines. Since the anti-Muslim riots that exploded in 2002, the Muslim minority population have been denied justice and marginalised to the ghettos. Meanwhile, Narendra Modi, who has been accused of complicity in the riots, has ridden a wave of popularity. Through the intimate stories of American-Gujarati Nishrin, whose father, a prominent Muslim MP, was butchered during the 2002 Gujarat riots, and British-Gujarati Imran, who was the sole survivor when he was attacked along with his two uncles a friend while on holiday in the state, the film explores Modi's link to the violence and the minority community's ongoing struggle for justice.
movie.description_full: At a time where the controversial Chief Minister of Gujarat, Narendra Modi, is running to be India's next Prime Minister, Even the Crows explores the way in which his politics and Hindu nationalist ideology have polarised Gujarat along religious lines. Since the anti-Muslim riots that exploded in 2002, the Muslim minority population have been denied justice and marginalised to the ghettos. Meanwhile, Narendra Modi, who has been accused of complicity in the riots, has ridden a wave of popularity. Through the intimate stories of American-Gujarati Nishrin, whose father, a prominent Muslim MP, was butchered during the 2002 Gujarat riots, and British-Gujarati Imran, who was the sole survivor when he was attacked along with his two uncles a friend while on holiday in the state, the film explores Modi's link to the violence and the minority community's ongoing struggle for justice.

movies.title: Mystery of the Hope Diamond
movies.summary: The program tells the history, both documented and supposed, of the Hope Diamond including the source of the legendary curse. Then the mystery of the deep blue color and red phosphorescence is partially explained.
movies.description_full: The program tells the history, both documented and supposed, of the Hope Diamond including the source of the legendary curse. Then the mystery of the deep blue color and red phosphorescence is partially explained.
movies.synopsis: The program tells the history, both documented and supposed, of the Hope Diamond including the source of the legendary curse. Then the mystery of the deep blue color and red phosphorescence is partially explained.

movies.title: SEC Ready
movies.summary: Most assumed Texas A&M was meant for mediocrity when the Aggies joined the SEC. Few knew the toughest hurdles were already behind them. In exclusive interviews "SEC Ready" tells the behind-the-scenes stories that shaped a defining decision.
movies.description_full: Most assumed Texas A&M was meant for mediocrity when the Aggies joined the SEC. Few knew the toughest hurdles were already behind them. In exclusive interviews "SEC Ready" tells the behind-the-scenes stories that shaped a defining decision.

movies.title: Being Frank: The Chris Sievey Story
movies.title_english: Being Frank: The Chris Sievey Story
movies.title_long: Being Frank: The Chris Sievey Story (2018)
movies.summary: It's a documentary about the life of eccentric comedian Frank Sidebottom who wore a huge papier-mache' head and whose true identity was a closely guarded secret until after he died. The 2014 Magnolia Pictures film titled Frank was inspired by his sensational mystery.
movies.description_full: It's a documentary about the life of eccentric comedian Frank Sidebottom who wore a huge papier-mache' head and whose true identity was a closely guarded secret until after he died. The 2014 Magnolia Pictures film titled Frank was inspired by his sensational mystery.

movies.title: The Dog Doc
movies.summary: Called a maverick, a miracle-worker, and a quack, Dr. Marty Goldstein is a pioneer of integrative veterinary medicine. By holistically treating animals after other vets have given up, Goldstein provides a last hope for pet owners with nothing left to lose.
movies.description_full: Called a maverick, a miracle-worker, and a quack, Dr. Marty Goldstein is a pioneer of integrative veterinary medicine. By holistically treating animals after other vets have given up, Goldstein provides a last hope for pet owners with nothing left to lose.
